original_text: As soon as ye be come into the city, ye shall straightway find him, before he go up to the high place to eat: for the people will not eat until he come, because he doth bless the sacrifice; and afterwards they eat that be bidden. Now therefore get you up; for about this time ye shall find him.
korean_text: 당신들이 성읍으로 들어가면 그가 먹으러 산당에 올라가기 전에 곧 만나리이다 그가 오기 전에는 백성이 먹지 아니하나니 이는 그가 제물을 축사한 후에야 청함을 받은 자가 먹음이니이다 그러므로 지금 올라가소서 곧 그를 만나리이다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: As soon as ye be come into the city
before he go up to the high place to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 먹으러 높은 곳에 올라가기 전에

sentences.original_text: for the people will not eat until he come
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들은 그가 올 때까지 먹지 않을 것이니

sentences.original_text: because he doth bless the sacrifice
and afterwards they eat that be bidden
for about this time ye shall find him
sentences.korean_translation: 이 때쯤이면 너희가 그를 찾을 것이다
